query: SELECT mes, ano, COUNT(*) as total_lojas, SUM(total_servicos) as total_servicos, AVG(taxa_reparacao) as media_taxa_reparacao FROM resultados_mensais WHERE mes = 1 AND ano = 2026 GROUP BY mes, ano;
